title: Linux Skills: Manage System Services
author: Damon M Garn
description: System administrators are responsible for service management on Linux devices. Here is what they need to know about configuration, startup options, security and more.
cntitle: Linux 技能：管理系统服务
cndescription: 系统管理员负责 Linux 设备上的服务管理。以下是他们需要了解的有关配置、启动选项、安全等方面的信息。
